name: Random Numbers 003 - Lightning
description:
When I was younger storms seemed so much bigger; lightning brighter and thunder louder. Now that I understand and can explain the storms, it removes some of their mystery and majesty. This piece gives some of that back through 5 screens of random number generated lightning. Each screen flashes to another unique, and unrepeatable frame; the random number patterns completely unpredictable. 
___
Medium: Spreadsheet | Random Number Generator | Autoformatting
Method: Black, white and Grey shades formatted to numbers between 1 and 1000; randomized downwards according to the numbers around them 
Non auto-generated - each screen is manually generated and then edited together. 
___
This is the third in a series of "Random Number Generated Art". Find me on Twitter if you liked it.
